snippet: The Justice Department says it must focus on Americans traveling abroad because they could receive training, become radicalized, and then return to the United States to launch attacks.
abstract: United States steps up fight to block Americans from traveling abroad to join Islamic State extremist group; Justice Dept worries that these fighters will become radicalized on the battlefields of Syria and return to the United States to carry out terrorist attacks.
lead_paragraph: The Justice Department says it must focus on Americans traveling abroad because they could receive training, become radicalized, and then return to the United States to launch attacks.

headline.main: U.S. Steps Up Fight to Block ISIS Volunteers
headline.print_headline: U.S. Steps Up Fight to Block ISIS Volunteers

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations
